column4: fsck -n tells me that there are a couple of errors on my root & home partitions. what should i do next? is there a option for "scan & repair at next boot"? oder do i have to use a live-cd?
dorot, can i use fsck on my root partition when in recovery mode?
thanks. I have a fresh install of Ubuntu, never used it before, complete Ubuntu noob, but been using Linux for years...
